description.original: Adds ability to link with any trigger. Each trigger can limit linking to specific folders or file.
description.translation: 添加使用任意触发符号创建链接的功能。每个触发符号可以限制链接到特定的文件夹或文件。

dict.Notice(`Unable to get the file at path:: Notice(`无法获取路径 ${value.obj.filePath} 下的文件。请在 GitHub 上提交问题，这是不应该发生的。`,0)
Notice(`无法获取路径 ${settings.addNewNoteTemplateFile} 下的文件。请在设置中验证该路径。`)
dict.Notice(`Unable to create new note at pat: Notice(`无法在路径 ${value.obj?.filePath} 创建新笔记。请在 GitHub 上提交问题，https://github.com/Mara-Li/symbol-linking/issues`,0)
dict.Notice(`Unable to get the file at path:: Notice(`无法获取路径 ${value.obj?.filePath} 下的文件。请在 GitHub 上提交问题，这是不应该发生的。`,0)
dict.Notice(\"Trigger symbol must be a single: Notice("触发符号必须是单个字符。")
dict.Notice(`Unable to find folder at path: $: Notice(`无法在路径 ${folder.path} 找到文件夹。如果您想限制链接到此文件夹，请添加它。`)
dict.Notice(`Unable to find template file at: Notice(`无法在路径 ${settings.addNewNoteTemplateFile}.md 找到模板文件。请在设置中验证该路径。`)
dict.Notice(`Unable to find folder for new no: Notice(`无法在路径 ${settings.addNewNoteDirectory} 找到新笔记文件夹。如果您想在此文件夹中创建新笔记，请添加它。`)
dict.Notice(\"Invalid regex or flags\"): Notice("无效的正则表达式或标志")
dict.Notice(\"Convertir the settings of @ sym: Notice("将 @ 符号链接的设置转换为自定义建议器")
dict.Notice(\"Add new note template file path: Notice("添加新笔记模板文件路径未设置。请在设置中设置它。")
dict..log(\"Symbol Linking: Error creating fi: .log("符号链接：创建第一个链接时出错",error)
dict..error(`@ Symbol Linking: Unable to read: .error(`@ Symbol Linking: Unable to read core plugin templates config at path: ${coreTemplatesConfigPath}`)
dict.text:\"If no folders are added, links wi: text:"If no folders are added, links will be sourced from all folders."
dict.text:\"May be slower than the native pop: text:"May be slower than the native popup."
dict.text:\"When set above 0, you'll need to: text:"When set above 0, you'll need to press escape, return/enter, or type over X spaces to close the popup."
dict..setName(\"Append as header if it doesn': .setName("如果标题不存在则追加为标题")
dict..setName(\"Add new note if it doesn't ex: .setName("如果笔记不存在则添加新笔记")
dict..setName(\"Leave popup open for X spaces: .setName("让弹窗保持打开 X 个空格的时间")
dict..setName(\"Remove accents from search qu: .setName("从搜索查询中移除重音符号")
dict..setDesc(`Limit to one files for contact:
.setDesc(`将联系人链接限制为单个文件，使用标题 (${messageAboutLevel}) 作为联系人名称。
				留空则使用目录结构。`)
dict..setDesc(`If the header doesn't exist wh: .setDesc(`当使用 ${this.plugin.settings.triggerSymbol} 链接时，如果标题不存在，则添加一个选项在文件末尾创建 ${atTheLevel} 级标题。`)
dict..setDesc(`If the note doesn't exist when: .setDesc(`当使用 ${this.plugin.settings.triggerSymbol} 链接时，如果笔记不存在，则添加一个选项创建该笔记。`)
dict..setDesc(`Folder to create new notes in: .setDesc(`使用 ${this.plugin.settings.triggerSymbol} 链接时创建新笔记的文件夹。如果使用了限制目录，该文件夹将是触发符号选择的受限目录。`)
dict..setDesc(\"e.g. \\xE9 -> e when searchin: .setDesc("例如：在通过弹窗搜索或创建链接时，\xE9 会转换为 e。")
